main event: Observers, including 3 Air Force Navigators, witnessed an unidentified object approaching from a 45° angle at 360° and maneuvering erratically.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 90 seconds,The object displayed erratic side-to-side movements while maintaining a straight course,The observers were conducting practice exercises when they noticed the object,The weather conditions during the sighting were clear,The object was described as orange-white in color.
witness description: Air Force Navigators from Ellington Air Force Base
